description: Roman period burial site, including a circular building, dating from the early Roman period, which has been interpreted as a possible shrine.
bibliography: Martyn, Blick, Brindle, and et al. “Manor Farm, Portesham (Dorset).” The Rural Settlement of Roman Britain: an online resource, 2015. https://doi.org/10.5284/1030449.
Valentin. “Manor Farm, Portesham, Dorset: Excavations on a Multi-Period Religious and Settlement Site.” Proceedings of the Dorset Natural History and Archaeological Society 125 (2003).
